comment: /**  * Build and return a message code consisting of the given fields,  * usually delimited by {@link DefaultMessageCodesResolver#CODE_SEPARATOR}.  * @param errorCode e.g.: "typeMismatch"  * @param objectName e.g.: "user"  * @param field e.g. "age"  * @return concatenated message code, e.g.: "typeMismatch.user.age"  * @see DefaultMessageCodesResolver.Format  */
code: /**  * Build and return a message code consisting of the given fields,  * usually delimited by {@link DefaultMessageCodesResolver#CODE_SEPARATOR}.  * @param errorCode e.g.: "typeMismatch"  * @param objectName e.g.: "user"  * @param field e.g. "age"  * @return concatenated message code, e.g.: "typeMismatch.user.age"  * @see DefaultMessageCodesResolver.Format  */ String format(String errorCode, @Nullable String objectName, @Nullable String field).
